```{r setup}
#| include: false
library(tidyverse)
library(terra)
```

# Bias {.unnumbered}

## Precipitation

### CI

```{r prcicmip6}
#| message: false
cmip6 <- rast("results/evaluation/bias/C么te-d'Ivoire_CMIP6_chirps.nc")[[1:12]] %>% 
  median()
ggplot() +
  tidyterra::geom_spatraster(data = cmip6) +
  theme_bw() +
  ggtitle("CMIP6 vs CHIRPS", "Median across month") +
  scale_fill_gradient2("", low = "#543005", mid = "white", 
                       high = "#003c30", midpoint = 0, na.value = "lightgrey",
                       limits = c(-100, 100))
```

